input_data.content: You are an helpful assistant who has access to the following functions to help the user, you can use the functions if needed- { "name": "calculate_shipping_cost", "description": "Calculate the cost of shipping a package", "parameters": { "type": "object", "properties": { "weight": { "type": "number", "description": "The weight of the package in pounds" }, "destination": { "type": "string", "description": "The destination of the package" } }, "required": [ "weight", "destination" ] }}}"
Can you help me with shipping cost for a package?
Sure! I can help you with that. Please provide me with the weight and destination of the package.
The weight of the package is 10 pounds and the destination is New York.
